biotools.summary: Ortholuge-based orthology predictions for completely sequenced bacterial and archaeal genomes. Also contains reciprocal best hit-based ortholog predictions, in-paralog predictions (recently duplicated genes) and proposed ortholog groups.

bioschemas.name: OrtholugeDB
bioschemas.summary: Ortholuge-based orthology predictions for completely sequenced bacterial and archaeal genomes. Also contains reciprocal best hit-based ortholog predictions, in-paralog predictions (recently duplicated genes) and proposed ortholog groups.
